title: Backgrounds
content: Help Mol steal the Idol of Silvanus. Alley Cats Meet both the lordly cat and the tadpole-hunting cat. Bugging Out Help Wulbren escape Moonrise. Child at Heart Play both games of hide and seek with Oliver. Gone Feral Free the mind-controlled gnolls from their master. Good Deed of the Day Free Nightsong. Newly Downtrodden Spare the goblins from Ketheric's wrath. No Peeking! Block out True Soul Z'rell from reading your intentions. Orphan Camaraderie Help Mol win the game of lanceboard. Rebellious
